data.title: Family of Samuel C. MANN [2271]
data.text:
Family Links

Spouses/Children:

1. Ann DOWNER [2961]

Noah MANN [1851]+

Henry MANN [2970]

Samuel MANN [2971]

George Arthur MANN [2972]+

Charles MANN [2973]

Thomas MANN [2974]

Hannah MANN [2975]

John Wesley MANN [2976]

Mark MANN [2962]

Eli Downer MANN [2963]

Moses MANN [2964]

Edwin MANN [2965]

Samuel C. MANN [2271]

Born: 4 May 1782, Pulborough, , Sussex, England

Marriage (1): Ann DOWNER [2961] on 27 September 1802 in Billingshurst, , Sussex, England

Died: 9 June 1836, Montréal, , Québec, Canada at age 54

Buried: June 1836, Montréal, , Québec, Canada

FamilySearch ID: LXKP-RQ3.

Death Notes:

Samuel died upon arrival in Canada at the age of 53.

Noted events in his life were:

1. He worked as a labourer, generally employed on the highways on parish relief in 1836 in , , , England.

2. He emigrated to Montreal, Québec, Canada on the ship Heber as part of the Petworth Immigration Project on 5 June 1836 from Pevensey, , Sussex, England. The family came on the ship Heber, A1, 441 tons; master Captain Rue; superintendent appointed by the Petworth Emigration Committee: James Marr Brydone; sailed from Portsmouth (Spithead) 28 April 1836; arrived at Quebec 5 June 1836/Quebec, Canada.

According to Poor Law records at the Public Record Office at Kew, Wisborough Green Vestry borrowed £200 in 1836 to send a party of people to Canada. Among these they listed the following:

Noah Mann (33)

Elizabeth Mann (32)

Noah Mann (10)

Ambrose Mann (8)

Meshec Mann (6)

Sadrac Mann (4)

Hannah Mann (2)

Ellen Mann (infant)

Also listed on that voyage were Noah's parents and four of his younger brothers:

Samuel Mann (54)

Elizabeth Mann (53)

Mark Mann (16)

Eli Downer Mann (14)

Moses Mann (12)

Edwin Mann (9) This event was shared with Ambrose MANN [2957], Ann DOWNER [2961], Edwin MANN [2965], Eli Downer MANN [2963], Elizabeth Ann SHERWIN [1852], Ellen MANN [2960], Hannah MANN [138], Mark MANN [2962], Meshach MANN [2958], Moses MANN [2964], Noah MANN [1851], Noah Nelson MANN, Jr. [2956], and Shadrach MANN [2959].

3. He has conflicting death information of 15 June 1836 in Montréal, , Québec, Canada.

Samuel married Ann DOWNER [2961] [MRIN: 4152], daughter of John DOWNER [2966] and Sarah BREDEN [2967], on 27 September 1802 in Billingshurst, , Sussex, England. (Ann DOWNER [2961] was born on 25 February 1783 in Petworth, , Sussex, England and died on 9 November 1845 in Adelaide, Middlesex, Ontario, Canada.)

Marriage Notes:
